creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: seven horizontal bands; # 2, 4, and 6 are white silk; #5 and 7 brown silk; #3 is zigzag embroidery with orange, green and blue; each band outlined in appliqued bands of narrow stripes; top waist band and lining are blue cotton
title: Skirt
